name: Art Art: A Short Experience
description:
This Is Art Art

Art Art, is a short (game?) experience made for my communications class. The point of the assignment was to create something that means a lot to you and that's exactly what I did! Hope you enjoy and let me know how you like it!

Resources used:

  • https://www.freesound.org/
  • Font is PT Mono
  • YouTube Sounds
